lexUnit.name: dining room.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a room in a house or hotel in which meals are eaten.

sentence.text: Dinner , with a choice of menu , is served in the hotel 's attractive dining room .
Something had , at any rate , when she returned to the dining room a few minutes later .

Peggy Rockcliffe has worked hard to achieve its present high degree of comfort , adding bathrooms , a dining room and turning a barn into a spacious sitting room .
